meanings.definition: A toxic organophosphate insecticide used to control pests in agriculture.
meanings.sent1: Farmers sprayed diazinon on their crops to keep insects away.
meanings.sent2: The diazinon was effective in protecting the plants from harmful bugs.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous insects threw a party when they heard about the diazinon coming to town.
meanings.sent4: The diazinon acted like a shield, guarding the fields from the tiny invaders.
meanings.sent5: The smell of diazinon lingered in the air, a reminder of the battle against pests.
